Issues discussed at the fourth meeting of the Strategic Cooperation Council and resolving these issues (cont) http://t.co/McjTOCO1PC
Today, there are no closely related countries like Turkey and Azerbaijan in the world, and there are many points that confirm this unity.
Turkey's invitation to Azerbaijan to the G-20 is a continuation of Turkey's and Azerbaijan's, as well as all the world's nations (cont) http://t.co/LelLqfJ4OP
We will celebrate the victory of Çanakkale on April 24. Choosing this date is a very wise step.
Last year, Turkey-Azerbaijan joint military exercises were held in Azerbaijan within a few days.
These exercises will be continued on a regular basis.
Turkey supports the justice, right and international law in the Armenian-Azerbaijani Nagorno-Karabakh conflict.
Armenia does not want peace and, unfortunately, the OSCE Minsk Group can not produce any results in these cases.
Last year there was some progress in the negotiation process. However, Armenia's provocative character (cont) http://t.co/yU1SJ43Ka6
Nagorno-Karabakh is an ancient land of Azerbaijan. Azerbaijan will restore its sovereignty and territorial integrity.
The first consultative council of the Southern Gas Corridor will be held in Baku next month. At the Council's meeting, this is (cont) http://t.co/RuWnIxrQpj
The Southern Gas Corridor and the development of the Shah Deniz field are currently Europe's largest infrastructure projects.
$ 45 billion will be invested in this project.
TANAP, Baku-Tbilisi-Kars and other projects are of strategic importance, and Turkey and Azerbaijan play a leading role here.
I am sure that all these projects will be implemented in a timely manner.

A great meeting with President Obama covering  the economy, global security, cyber-terrorism and Iran. http://t.co/Db6kMaN3SC
President Obama said the UK and US economies are "standing out" in a difficult world - "So we must be doing something right."
The President and I agreed we must remain ever vigilant against the poisonous Islamist narrative, but we will defeat it.
President Obama and I believe more sanctions now on Iran would be counter-productive and would undermine valuable international unity.
